pre_caption: This wide shot captures a sunlit Japanese street scene. In the center foreground, a woman in black clothing with a white face mask initially faces left, then turns and walks towards the right foreground. A multi-directional signpost is positioned in the center-left middle ground, slightly behind and to the left of the woman in black. Stone and wooden pillars are visible in the center-right foreground. The camera maintains an objective, eye-level viewpoint.
